showerReviews.reviewText: â€¦ are many food options, and the interior of the travel center is extremely spacious and clean. The ceilings are super high so it really gives it a nice vibe when you're inside. Shower was clean, as was the bathroom. I'll definitely be back.

This place is nasty. I wouldn't touch or drink anything that doesn't come sealed in a bag or bottle. I paid my shower and got a used uncleaned room. I had no issue wiping the toilet down myself. In and out with minimal touching. So I â€¦
â€¦ RESTROOMS ARE SO FILTHY, YOU'LL WANT TO HAVE A SHOWER AFTER YOU USE THEM â€¦
Very nice truck stop in Bloomfield CT areas.  Foods are great. 2 shower rooms available.  Staffs are very friendly.  I will definitely be back here regularly.  Thank you.  Brandon

â€¦ especially for truck drivers., too many complaints of this location via all over the website and apps, they donâ€™t immediately clean shower for next person to use, they only do ATM for laundry if you do not have â€œCash for Coinsâ€., they â€¦

This place is a dump, 15 bucks for parking and 14 bucks for a shower and they don't do team showers so u end up paying 28 bucks....food is over priced and ppl working here don't take pride in appearances or in customer service, Way to take â€¦

â€¦ he just stands there looking at me with a displeased face. I left a phone number for taking a shower, he said he would call within 40 minutes, 1.5 hours had passed, he still did not call. I have no desire to come here again. I have never â€¦

At this gas station at night I stopped to take a shower. Here the man said 30-40 minutes I will clean 20 minutes passed. Walks back and forth does not clean. The man does not do that. He is somehow shell-shocked. ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ» â€¦

showerReviews.reviewText: Iâ€™ve gotten several shower doors from CT shower and bath and theyâ€™ve all been great. One door had a bit of an unexpected delay but with the way things are these days itâ€™s to be expected.

We had a major kitchen renovation (walls torn down, everything to the studs) completed through CT shower and bath. We spoke with a number of designers/contractors in the area, we felt that Steve and Judy at CT Shower and Bath came up with â€¦

Creation and installation of a custom glass shower door.  Very well run organization.  Steven who I dealt with directly was extremely knowledgeable and professional.  Dan and Shawn who installed were awesome -- extremely personable and very â€¦

â€¦ are delightful to work with. After my first call to inquire about a custom shower door, I told my dad (a local contractor) that I was going to hire them just based on how nice and helpful the owner is. The team was communicative and prompt â€¦

CT Shower & Bath installed the shower door in our newly remodeled bathroom. It is absolutely beautiful and we could not be happier. Bailey was a pleasure to work with and is very sweet, professional and knowledgeable about the products. Fro â€¦

I am I home improvement contractor and I send all my clients to Connecticut shower the five or six jobs They've done for me at all turned out very well, service is great the girls doing the ordering know their stuff in the insulation thanks â€¦

Working with owner Steve Vendetta to design & select a custom vanity and a frameless shower door was a pleasure. His experience and knowledge coupled with exceptional insight to our preferences were valuable to our bathroom remodel success. â€¦
